label: grantedCertificate
comment: A product certificate granted for this monitoring IOT device.
A product certificate granted for this monitoring sensor.

rangeIncludes.comment: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.

domainIncludes.comment: An IOT (Internet of Things) piece of mechanical or electronic equipment which can collect, report and autonomously transmit digital data.
An object which can detect and measure physical properties and which can record, indicate and transmit such measurements.
